climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: WELL MADE - Made of high-density fabric with line weave textile. 1.6-inch inner-diameter grommets that fit most of the curtain rod; 2" bottom hem enable sheers hanging more vertical.

LINEN TEXTURED - Soild curtains with subtle linen design are more intersting looking then plain sheers. Unlike ordinary sheers,the line weave makes curtains more draped and aesthetic, which let light peek through & create a private view. Sheers are formaldehyde-free and no odor, safe and green to kids and nursery.

PRIVACY SEMI SHEER - Beautifully frames your windows with a soft and hazy vision. Softly filtering out harsh sunlight and let the breeze flow through your windows. Appears a light, airy and privacy look for bedroom, kitchen, living room, bathroom, laundry room, studio...
WIDE COMPATIBILITY - RYB HOME has various styles of SHEERS, BLACKOUT CURTAINS to meet your ideal for home decor, which provides a harmonious window dressing and makes your home lively.
EASY CARE - Easy to maintain and machine washable. Quick ironing or steam cleaning, machine washable & drying when needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These panels are exactly what I was searching for!
reviews.reviewText: After too many purchases and returns to count, I finally found exactly what I was look for! I have a very small home and wanted something for my dining room patio door that wouldn’t make the room look even smaller. These sheers have the perfect amount of sheerness to allow us to still see outside when opened to a single panel thickness. And when evenly distributed, they also help to filter the direct sunlight that shines through in the morning without making the room too dark. We have two panels on a 5’ sliding patio door and freely slide them in whichever direction we need. I love them!These sheers have weight to them. The fabric is substantial and not at all flimsy. And the nice open weave allows for a perfect filtering of light without making the room too dark. And because of their weight, I have had no trouble with wrinkles. And they are heavy enough that they do not blow all over when the slider is opened and we have a gentle breeze.The only downside, and it’s not really a downside for me because I don’t have neighbors out my back door; is that just like they allow you to see outside, they allow someone else to see inside at night when your lights are turned on. Not defined details, but more of blurred or shadowed shapes. So, if that’s a problem for you, you may prefer something else. For me, these panels are perfect for my dining room! And the price was very fair for the product. I would definitely purchase these again.And, I like that unlike mounted vertical blinds, these sheers can be tossed into the washer! Because hey, life happens! I am very happy with my purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and looks beautiful
reviews.reviewText: The linen like texture adds an elegant and high end look to this classic and simple sheer curtain. Great quality for the price.I purchased one 100"W x 84"H panel to use on our sliding patio door. The panel is not heavy so I didn't need to use a 3rd bracket in the center to support the 1" diameter curtain rod. The 100"W panel fits perfectly on our 72"W patio door.I will buy 2 more to use in our dining room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars semi sheer and nice
reviews.reviewText: Semi sheer allowing just enough light in to help me wake up but not so much as to be disruptive if I sleep in. Beautiful with sturdy grommets, well sewn.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great addition for that farmhouse feel.
reviews.reviewText: 10/10 would buy these again. The quality was great. They are much thicker than I was expecting which was a nice surprise. The color is just as described. These curtains helped add to the farmhouse vibe I was going for! I will be purchasing again for my kitchen!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lovely but inconsistent
reviews.reviewText: First, these light, translucent, airy curtains are lovely. We started purchasing the white ones for our home a year ago, and they have held up well. One set in particular has been subject to opening and closing at the sliding glass door and doesn't show any signs of falling apart after a year.However, I recently purchased more for our home and was dismayed to discover a manufacturing defect in one set with the fabric not correctly seated under the grommet/ring. The second set ran short, at 82" long instead of the 84" advertised on the listing. It took ordering a third set to find one that was acceptable. Thank goodness Amazon makes it easy to return products. Additionally, I discovered that the curtains that I purchased last year were really 86" long, not 84". I didn't notice then because we were using existing curtain rods which I thought were at the wrong height. We're installing new rods anyway so now we have to deal with installing them higher or seeing if my spare set is shorter! Or if they shrink in the wash!For the price, these are really a bargain thus the 4 stars. Just know that if you purchase these, be prepared for some frustration in dealing with too long/too short/defective sets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Had to buy a new pair, my cats like to hang from them and ruined the first pair. These are relatively inexpensive and nice quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light filtering, but not too sheer and fragile
reviews.reviewText: I really like these curtains. They look airy and soft, but are substantial enough so as not to look so sheer and fragile. I did lightly iron them after taking them out of the package, and they ironed up nicely. You would want to be careful with the temp on your iron though. There weren’t any irregularities with the construction nor any fabric irregularities. They let light through and offer nice privacy at the same time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These curtains are great quality and look fantastic in my living room. I don't like the bunching on top of the curtain rods that you get with normal curtains so I went with the tabs. The color is nice it feels very light and airy without looking cheap.
Buyer beware, there is only one panel in the extra wide curtain. Make sure you buy two!

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent product, i highly recommend it

reviews.reviewText: Son excelentes, realmente son hermosas, de excelente calidad. Comprare más porque me encantaron.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good quality but colour is off
reviews.reviewText: Depending on how you look at them the deep grey colour has a greenish tone to them, not what I was looking forBut good quality
